data.text: @DelthiaRicks @Christi92965066 License, registration, a screw driver to take your license plates. Here is a ticket with your arraignment planned, more charges pending.  Your vehicle is impounded until it can be emptied & thoroughly searched. Due to unvaxxed police layoffs you can expect the truck back in '23.
@DelthiaRicks @Laurie_Garrett Just looking for an excuse for a convoy. Watched "Smokey and the Bandit" once too often. No Firebird Trans Ams anymore, though.
@CL2Empower @DelthiaRicks They'll blame Biden when they can't afford to fill up 😊

@DelthiaRicks @Laurie_Garrett Well, the CDC kind of took the wind out of the truckers’ sails. Plus, they’d look like whiny little brats protesting freedom from a public health piece of fabric when brave Ukrainian civilians are fighting for their literal freedom. At least they read the room.
@DelthiaRicks The muh freedum privileged dorks. Ukrainians showing yall what fighting for freedom is. Bet yall love you some putin Trump cult stuff
